CLIFTON FADIMAN—well known author, critic and editor—has long been a lover of wines. SAM AARON- president of the renowned wine shop Sherry-Lehmann—is one of America’s leading wine experts. Together they have brilliantly collaborated to create a veritable tome of wine treasures. This sumptuously illustrated volume is a true encyclopedia of wine knowledge, and a compendium of wine lore. Published by Harry N.
